content.rendered:
New reformatted edition

An array of erotic emotions from tender passion to raw sensuality

A collection of masterpieces from the ancient, sensuous classics—from The Kama Sutra and The Perfumed Garden to the wild and wanton Roxana and Lady Chatterly’s Lover.

Find yourself delightfully shocked at The Memoirs of Giacomo Casanova de Seingalt, that renowned rake and those of the charming courtesan, Harriette Wilson. Go on a vicarious journey with My Life and Loves and The Boudoir.

Let this erotic anthology take you over the edge of ecstasy and plunge you right into a volcano of passionate adventure.

Find yourself delightfully shocked at The Memoirs of Giacomo Casanova de Seingalt, that renowned rake […]
